meanings.definition: To cause (someone) to remember someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Seeing the old photo reminds me of my childhood.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh bread reminds me of my grandmother's kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The sound of the bell reminds me to feed my pet fish.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song reminds me of a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ocean reminds me of vast possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The red dress reminds me of a ripe apple.
meanings.sent2: The clock ticking reminds me of the passing of time.
meanings.sent3: The chirping of birds reminds me of a morning symphony.
meanings.sent4: The scent of flowers reminds me of a colorful garden.
meanings.sent5: The taste of lemonade reminds me of sunny days.
